data.title: Ryan Reynolds admits marriage fears after Scarlett Johansson divorce
data.meta_description: Ryan Reynolds split from Scarlett Johansson back in 2010, with the Hollywood actor now married with four kids to Blake Lively.
data.text:
Ryan Reynolds, 46, has been happily married to Blake Lively since 2012, with the pair recently welcoming their fourth child.

However, this was not his first marriage, having previously tied the knot to Marvel star Scarlett Johansson.

Their romance kicked off back in 2007, with the pair getting engaged in 2008 thanks to their undeniable chemistry.

Less than five months later, they A-List couple wed in Vancouver and hoped for a happy long future together.

Sadly, this did not work out with their busy Hollywood schedules, and they announced their split in 2010 in a joint statement.

READ MORE: Inside Amanda Holden and Les Dennis' turbulent marriage

As reported by FandomWire, the Deadpool star spoke out shortly after his painful divorce, sharing his doubts on whether he wanted to marry again.

He explained: "Anyone who gets divorced goes through a lot of pain, but you come out of it. I'm not out of it yet, at all.

"I don’t think I want to get married again…But you always re-evaluate these things."

Ryan did appear to re-evaluate as he went on to remarry his Gossip Girl star wife Blake in 2012.

The beloved Hollywood couple went on to have three daughters James, eight, Inez, six, and Betty, three.

Earlier this year, they welcomed their fourth child, whose name or gender hasn't been revealed.

Meanwhile, Scarlett went on to marry Romain Dauriac in 2014, before they split up in 2017.

The former couple share an eight-year-old daughter, Rose.

In 2020, she married Colin Jost, and they announced the birth of their son, Cosmo, in 2021.

Scarlett made a rare comment about her ex-husband on Gwyneth Paltrow's podcast, Goop, when the entrepreneur questioned her being married twice.

In response, the actor corrected her, saying: "Three times."

Gwyneth replied: "Oh that’s right, because I forgot that you were married to Ryan Reynolds! Goals!"

Scarlett quickly laughed before reflecting on her previous marriage, quipping: "We weren’t married very long, but we were when I first met you, for Iron Man [2] or whatever."

Gwyneth then added: "We love a good Ryan Reynolds in our house."

The Black Widow star laughed and then nodded in agreement, as she said: "He's a good guy."

Announcing their split in 2010, the statement read: "After long and careful consideration on both our parts, we’ve decided to end our marriage.

"We entered our relationship with love and it’s with love and kindness we leave it. While privacy isn’t expected, it’s certainly appreciated."
